title: Sr Executive Relationship Manager - Business Development
required_experience:
no_experience_required: False,

description:
Job Description The Sr Executive Relationship Manager role is an individual contributor level role and oversees market strategy, business development, sales and relationship management of our strategic partner in Brazil, while maintaining a goal alignment with the regional America's team. This role will expect you to manage the long-term and short-term strategic initiatives for the development of the account and growth of the acceptance in the market. He/she will be responsible for managing business development in one or more countries, regions, or industries. He/she serves as the relationship manager for multiple complex partner relationships, and performs market analyses and business-development activities to drive profitable sales volume. This individual will need to be available to travel approximately 35% of the time (domestic and international). Given the time zone of the client, the ideal candidate would be East Coast based. Responsibilities Explore new partnership opportunities that drive acceptance and volume growth. Manage client portfolio to retain and grow existing business by exploring acceptance and volume growth. Drive internal processes including; development of communications, account management, approval requests and contract negotiations, compliance and risk management. Build and maintain business development plan for card products and marketing initiatives. Be the primary point of contact and work in close relationship with our main client in Brazil. Assist and help coordinate with internal teams the implementation of company's products, release updates, waiver renewals and agreements. Understand and communicate market opportunities, needs and partner feedback to cross-functional teams and inform client's product roadmap and prioritization. Coordinate and arrange client events and meetings. Minimum Qualifications At a minimum, here's what we need from you:
Bachelor's Degree in Business, Finance, Marketing or related 8
years of experience in Payments, Relationship Management or Marketing 8
years of Technical expertise (i.e.; mobile payments, vehicle commerce, SRC, payment chip technology, IOT emerging technologies) to support digital partners In lieu of a degree, 10
years of experience in Payments, Relationship Management or Marketing Preferred Qualifications If we had our say, we'd also look for:
Master's Degree in Business, Finance, or Marketing Fluent in Portuguese (verbal and written) Experience executing business development across different card products and new payment technologies Experience managing senior level relationships Strong presence, communication and presentation skills Ability to work in a collaborative environment.
Salary Range:
$80K -- $100K
Minimum Qualification
Banking, Loans & InsuranceEstimated Salary: $20 to $28 per hour based on qualifications.
